meanings.definition: Students who are not majoring in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: In the biology class, the nonmajors were learning about ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: The university offers special programs for nonmajors interested in art history.
meanings.sent3: The nonmajors in the physics class were amazed by the experiments.
meanings.sent4: Among the nonmajors, her passion for literature shone like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The nonmajors explored the world of psychology with curiosity and enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: Courses designed for students who are not majoring in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The nonmajors enjoyed the introductory chemistry course.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a variety of nonmajors courses in different fields.
meanings.sent3: Taking the nonmajors course in astronomy was a stellar experience.
meanings.sent4: The nonmajors program opened doors to new academic horizons.
meanings.sent5: Nonmajors can benefit from the diverse range of courses available to them.
